Articles.Content:
every time I launch this craft it always rotates like this at the start and I don't know what caused it. Previously the ship was larger and this didn't happen.

list of my mods (may not be complete):

active texture management

B9 aerospace

Custom biomes

Deadly reentry

flight engineer

enhanced navball

ferram aerospace reasearch

FS hanger extender

interstellar

kerbal alarm clock

kerbal attachment system

kethane

kw rocketry

mechjeb

navhud

remote tech

tac life support

tac fuel balancer

vanguard technologies

This is my problem:

Welcome to the forums!

Not something I've seen before, but it could be due to outdated mods. Make sure all of your mods are updated to their most recent versions and that they are compatible with KSP 0.25. Then post a complete list including versions along with your output log. Read more about that in the How to Get Support sticky.
